title: Analyze Compensation Equity
description: A compensation analyst is conducting a pay equity study to check for gender- or race-based pay gaps.

tasks.description: Generate a report from the HRIS containing employee job title, salary, gender, and ethnicity data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst pulls the necessary raw data.

tasks.description: For each major job role, calculate the average salary for different demographic groups.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst performs statistical analysis to compare pay across groups.

tasks.description: Identify any statistically significant pay gaps and prepare a report of the findings for HR leadership.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst identifies potential areas of concern and creates a detailed report with recommendations.
